name: Last Hope Bunker: Zombie Survival Demo
name_original: Last Hope Bunker: Zombie Survival Demo
description:
Last Hope Bunker: Zombie Survival is coming soon and can be wishlisted here

Zombie hordes all around

In a world destroyed by a deadly virus, one doctor's obsession to find a cure led him down a dark path. When his experiments spiraled out of control, the virus spread further, exposing everyone in its wake. 

The Bunker is your fortress

Upgrade the bunker to stay alive and have a point to return to. Invite the people you have saved and let them help you on your way. 
 

Explore the world

The world is vast and still hides many necessary resources. Enter the abandoned ruins to find valuable items. Gather your findings in the bunker and craft advanced equipment to enhance your chances of survival. 

Survive in this live horror story

The world isn't a safe place anymore. Every step counts. Zombies aren't your friends. They just want your flesh. Stay vigilant. Be accurate. Stay alive. 

Find the path to the cure and your family

Dive deeper into the wastelands. Step by step, you get closer to reuniting with your family and finding the cure so desperately needed by the dying world.
